content: While this Tiger Vanguard is indeed related to the one you’ve faced at the Crouching Tiger Temple, he doesn’t fight in quite the exact same style, despite also having a sword. Understanding the differences and similarities in their style can help you succeed in this fight, but it will take a little practice.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard_(Kingdom_of_Sahali).md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard (Kingdom of Sahali)', specifically from the subsection '"Tiger Vanguard" Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
While this Tiger Vanguard is indeed related to the one you’ve faced at the Crouching Tiger Temple, he doesn’t fight in quite the exact same style, despite also having a sword. Understanding the differences and similarities in their style can help you succeed in this fight, but it will take a little practice.
